# Build results
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio cache
.vs/
*.vsidx

# Logs
*.log

# SQLite database
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# EF Core Migrations model snapshot backup
*Migrations*/**/*.cs~
*Migrations*/**/*.Designer.cs~

# Generated files
*.generated.cs

# Publish output
publish/
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user

# Rider
.idea/

# OS files
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store

# Others
*.cache
*.pdb
*.mdb

*.bak
